title: Violating Bell's inequality with remotely connected superconducting qubits
title_cn: 通过远程连接的超导量子比特来消除贝尔的不等式
abstract: Quantum communication relies on the efficient generation of entanglement between remote quantum nodes, as entanglement is required to achieve and verify secure communications. Remote entanglement has been realized using a number of different probabilistic schemes, but deterministic remote entanglement has only been demonstrated recently, using a variety of superconducting circuit approaches. However, the deterministic violation of a Bell inequality, a strong measure of quantum correlation, has not been demonstrated so far in a superconducting quantum communication architecture, in part because achieving sufficiently strong correlation requires fast and accurate control of the emission and capture of the entangling photons. Here, we present a simple and robust architecture for achieving this benchmark result in a superconducting system.
abstract_cn: 量子通信依赖于远程量子节点之间纠缠的有效生成，因为实现和验证安全通信需要纠缠。 已经使用许多不同的概率方案实现了远程纠缠，但是直到最近才使用各种超导电路方法证明了确定性远程纠缠。 但是，到目前为止，在超导量子通信体系结构中还没有证明对贝尔不等式的确定性违反，这是量子相关性的一种强有力的度量，部分原因是要实现足够强的相关性，需要对交缠和纠缠进行快速准确的控制 光子。 在这里，我们提出了一种简单而强大的体系结构，可以在超导系统中达到这一基准结果。

title: Continuous force and displacement measurement below the standard quantum limit
title_cn: 低于标准量子极限的连续力和位移测量
abstract: Quantum mechanics dictates that the precision of physical measurements must always comply with certain noise constraints. In the case of interferometric displacement measurements, these restrictions impose a standard quantum limit (SQL), which optimally balances the precision of a measurement with its unwanted backaction. To go beyond this limit, one must devise more sophisticated measurement techniques, which either ‘evade’ the backaction of the measurement or achieve clever cancellation of the unwanted noise at the detector. In the half-century since the SQL was established, systems ranging from LIGO to ultracold atoms and nanomechanical devices have pushed displacement measurements towards this limit, and a variety of sub-SQL techniques have been tested in proof-of-principle experiments. However, so far, no experimental system has successfully demonstrated an interferometric displacement measurement with sensitivity (including all relevant noise sources—thermal, backaction and imprecision) below the SQL. Here, we exploit strong quantum correlations in an ultracoherent optomechanical system to demonstrate off-resonant force and displacement sensitivity reaching 1.5 dB below the SQL. This achieves an outstanding goal in mechanical quantum sensing and further enhances the prospects of using such devices for state-of-the-art force sensing applications.
abstract_cn: 量子力学规定，物理测量的精度必须始终符合某些噪声限制。在干涉式位移测量的情况下，这些限制会施加标准的量子限制（SQL），该限制可在测量精度与不希望的反向作用之间取得最佳平衡。要超出此限制，必须设计出更复杂的测量技术，或者“逃避”。测量的反作用或巧妙地消除检测器上的有害噪声。自从SQL成立以来的半个世纪，从LIGO到超冷原子以及纳米机械设备的系统已将位移测量推向了这一极限，并且在原理验证实验中测试了各种sub-SQL技术。但是，到目前为止，还没有任何实验系统能够成功地证明干涉式位移测量的灵敏度（包括所有相关的噪声源，热，反作用和不精确度）低于SQL。在这里，我们利用超相干光机械系统中的强量子相关性来证明非共振力和位移灵敏度比SQL低1.5＆＃8201; dB。这实现了机械量子感测中的杰出目标，并进一步增强了将此类设备用于最新力感测应用的前景。

title: Avoided quasiparticle decay from strong quantum interactions
title_cn: 避免了强量子相互作用引起的准粒子衰变
abstract: Quantum states of matter—such as solids, magnets and topological phases—typically exhibit collective excitations (for example, phonons, magnons and anyons). These involve the motion of many particles in the system, yet, remarkably, act like a single emergent entity—a quasiparticle. Known to be long lived at the lowest energies, quasiparticles are expected to become unstable when encountering the inevitable continuum of many-particle excited states at high energies, where decay is kinematically allowed. Although this is correct for weak interactions, we show that strong interactions generically stabilize quasiparticles by pushing them out of the continuum. This general mechanism is straightforwardly illustrated in an exactly solvable model. Using state-of-the-art numerics, we find it at work in the spin-\(1/2\) triangular-lattice Heisenberg antiferromagnet (TLHAF). This is surprising given the expectation of magnon decay in this paradigmatic frustrated magnet. Turning to existing experimental data, we identify the detailed phenomenology of avoided decay in the TLHAF material Ba3CoSb2O9, and even in liquid helium, one of the earliest instances of quasiparticle decay. Our work unifies various phenomena above the universal low-energy regime in a comprehensive description. This broadens our window of understanding of many-body excitations, and provides a new perspective for controlling and stabilizing quantum matter in the strongly interacting regime.
abstract_cn: 物质的量子态（例如固体，磁体和拓扑相）通常表现出集体激发（例如，声子，磁振子和任意子）。这些涉及系统中许多粒子的运动，但值得注意的是，它们的作用类似于单个紧急实体。已知在最低能量下寿命长，准粒子在高能下遇到不可避免的多粒子激发态的连续谱时会变得不稳定，在高能下运动学上允许衰减。尽管这对于弱相互作用是正确的，但我们表明强相互作用通常通过将准颗粒推出连续体来稳定它们。在一个完全可求解的模型中直接说明了这种通用机制。使用最先进的数值，我们在自旋\（1/2 \）三角形格海森堡反铁磁体（TLHAF）中发现了它。考虑到这种范式受挫磁体中的磁振子衰减的预期，这令人惊讶。转向现有的实验数据，我们确定了TLHAF材料Ba 3 CoSb 2 O 9 中甚至液体中避免衰变的详细现象氦，准粒子衰变的最早实例之一。我们的工作在全面的描述中统一了普遍的低能状态之上的各种现象。这拓宽了我们对多体激发的理解范围，并为在强相互作用体系中控制和稳定量子物质提供了新的视角。

title: Kondo screening in a charge-insulating spinon metal
title_cn: 电荷绝缘的自旋金属的近藤筛选
abstract: The Kondo effect, an eminent manifestation of many-body physics in condensed matter, is traditionally explained as exchange scattering of conduction electrons on a spinful impurity in a metal. The resulting screening of the impurity’s local moment by the electron Fermi sea is characterized by a Kondo temperature TK, below which the system enters a strongly coupled regime. In recent years, this effect has found realizations beyond the bulk-metal paradigm in many other conduction-electron systems, such as in quantum dots in semiconductor heterostructures and nanomaterials, in quantum point contacts, in graphene and in topological insulators, and has also been predicted for three-dimensional Dirac and Weyl semimetals. Here, we report an experimental observation of Kondo screening by charge-neutral quasiparticles. This occurs in a charge-insulating quantum spin liquid, where spinon excitations forming a Fermi surface take the role of conduction electrons. The observed impurity behaviour therefore bears a strong resemblance to the conventional case in a metal. The discovered spinon-based Kondo effect provides a prominent platform for characterizing spin liquids in the general context of utilizing impurities as in situ probes of host electron states, and offers a unique way to manipulate these enigmatic states.
abstract_cn: 传统上，近藤效应是凝聚态中多体物理学的杰出表现，通常被解释为传导电子在金属中可旋转杂质上的交换散射。电子费米海对杂质局部力矩的最终筛选以近藤温度T K 为特征，在该温度以下，系统进入强耦合状态。近年来，在许多其他导电电子系统中，例如在半导体异质结构和纳米材料中的量子点，量子点接触，石墨烯和拓扑绝缘体中，已经发现了这种效果超出了体金属范式。可以预测三维Dirac和Weyl半金属。在这里，我们报告由电荷中性准粒子对近藤筛选的实验观察。这发生在电荷绝缘的量子自旋液体中，在该液体中，形成费米表面的自旋子激发起传导电子的作用。因此，观察到的杂质行为与金属中的常规情况非常相似。在自然界中，利用杂质作为宿主电子态的原位探针，发现了基于旋子的近藤效应，为表征自旋液体提供了一个重要的平台，并为操纵这些神秘态提供了独特的方法。

title: Chiral topological semimetal with multifold band crossings and long Fermi arcs
title_cn: 具有多重能带交叉和长费米弧的手性拓扑半金属
abstract: Topological semimetals in crystals with a chiral structure (which possess a handedness due to a lack of mirror and inversion symmetries) are expected to display numerous exotic physical phenomena, including fermionic excitations with large topological charge, long Fermi arc surface states, unusual magnetotransport and lattice dynamics, as well as a quantized response to circularly polarized light. So far, all experimentally confirmed topological semimetals exist in crystals that contain mirror operations, meaning that these properties do not appear. Here, we show that AlPt is a structurally chiral topological semimetal that hosts new four-fold and six-fold fermions, which can be viewed as a higher spin generalization of Weyl fermions without equivalence in elementary particle physics. These multifold fermions are located at high symmetry points and have Chern numbers larger than those in Weyl semimetals, thus resulting in multiple Fermi arcs that span the full diagonal of the surface Brillouin zone. By imaging these long Fermi arcs, we experimentally determine the magnitude and sign of their Chern number, allowing us to relate their dispersion to the handedness of their host crystal.
abstract_cn: 具有手性结构的晶体中的拓扑半金属（由于缺乏镜面和反对称性而具有惯性）有望显示出许多奇异的物理现象，包括具有大拓扑电荷的费米离子激发，费米弧长的表面态，异常磁传输和晶格动力学，以及对圆偏振光的量化响应。到目前为止，所有经实验证实的拓扑半金属都存在于包含镜操作的晶体中，这意味着这些特性不会出现。在这里，我们表明AlPt是一种结构性手性拓扑半金属，具有新的4倍和6倍费米子，这可以看作是Weyl费米子的更高的自旋推广，而在基本粒子物理学中却不等价。这些多重费米子位于高对称点，其Chern数大于Weyl半金属中的Chern数，因此会产生多个费米弧，这些费米弧覆盖整个布里渊区的对角线。通过对这些长费米弧进行成像，我们通过实验确定了其Chern数的大小和正负号，从而使我们可以将其分散度与其基质晶体的顺手性联系起来。

title: Universal optical control of chiral superconductors and Majorana modes
title_cn: 手性超导体和Majorana模式的通用光学控制
abstract: Chiral superconductors are a class of unconventional superconductors that host topologically protected chiral Majorana fermions at interfaces and domain walls, quasiparticles that could serve as a platform for topological quantum computing. Here we show that, in analogy to a qubit, the out-of-equilibrium superconducting state in such materials can be described by a Bloch vector and predict that they can be controlled on ultrafast timescales. The all-optical control mechanism is universal, permitting arbitrary rotations of the order parameter, and can induce a dynamical change of handedness of the condensate. It relies on transient breaking of crystal symmetries via choice of pulse polarization to enable arbitrary rotations of the Bloch vector. The mechanism extends to ultrafast timescales and the engineered state persists after the pump is switched off. We predict that these phenomena should appear in graphene or magic-angle twisted bilayer graphene, as well as Sr2RuO4 (refs. ). Furthermore, we show that chiral superconductivity can be detected in time-resolved pump–probe measurements. This paves the way towards a robust mechanism for ultrafast control and measurement of chirally ordered phases and Majorana modes.
abstract_cn: 手性超导体是一类非常规的超导体，它们在界面和畴壁上托管受拓扑保护的手性马约拉纳费米子，准粒子可以用作拓扑量子计算的平台。在这里，我们表明，类似于量子位，此类材料中的失衡超导状态可以通过Bloch矢量来描述，并预测它们可以在超快时标上进行控制。全光学控制机制是通用的，允许阶数参数任意旋转，并且可以引起冷凝液的顺手性动态变化。它依赖于通过选择脉冲极化来瞬时破坏晶体对称性，以实现Bloch矢量的任意旋转。该机制可扩展到超快的时间范围，并且在关闭泵后，工程状态仍然存在。我们预测这些现象应该出现在石墨烯或魔角扭曲的双层石墨烯以及Sr 2 RuO 4 中（参考文献＃8201;）。此外，我们表明可以在时间分辨泵探针测量中检测到手性超导性。这为建立一种强大的机制，以超快地控制和测量手性相和Majorana模式铺平了道路。

title: Intimate link between charge density wave, pseudogap and superconducting energy scales in cuprates
title_cn: 铜酸盐中电荷密度波，拟隙与超导能级之间的密切联系
abstract: The cuprate high-temperature superconductors develop spontaneous charge density wave (CDW) order below a temperature TCDW and over a wide range of hole doping (p). An outstanding challenge in the field is to understand whether this modulated phase is related to the more exhaustively studied pseudogap and superconducting phases. To address this issue, it is important to extract the energy scale ΔCDW associated with the CDW order, and to compare it with the pseudogap ΔPG and with the superconducting gap ΔSC. However, while TCDW is well characterized from earlier work, little is currently known about ΔCDW. Here, we report the extraction of ΔCDW for several cuprates using electronic Raman spectroscopy. We find that on approaching the parent Mott state by lowering p, ΔCDW increases in a manner similar to the doping dependence of ΔPG and ΔSC. This reveals that these three phases have a common microscopic origin. In addition, we find that ΔCDW ≈ ΔSC over a substantial doping range, which suggests that CDW and superconducting phases are intimately related; for example, they may be intertwined or connected by an emergent symmetry.

title: Orientational and directional locking of colloidal clusters driven across periodic surfaces
title_cn: 跨周期表面驱动的胶体团簇的方向和方向锁定
abstract: When particles are driven across crystalline surfaces, their trajectories do not necessarily follow the applied force but become locked to the substrate lattice directions. Such directional locking, being relevant for bottom-up nanodevice assembly and particle sorting, has been intensively studied for isolated or single particles. Here we experimentally study the motion of extended colloidal clusters sliding over a periodically corrugated surface. We observe that both their orientational and centre-of-mass motions become locked into directions not coinciding with the substrate symmetry but determined by the geometrical moiré superstructure formed by the cluster and substrate lattices. In general, such moiré superstructures are not strictly periodic, which leads to competing locking directions depending on cluster size. Remarkably, we uncover a dependence of directional locking on the higher Fourier components of the surface corrugation profile, which can be tuned on atomic surfaces via the external load. This allows for an unprecedented control of cluster steering relevant for nanomanipulations on surfaces.
abstract_cn: 当粒子被驱动跨过晶体表面时，其轨迹不一定遵循所施加的力，而是被锁定在基板晶格方向上。与自下而上的纳米器件组装和颗粒分选有关的这种方向锁定已针对隔离或单个颗粒进行了深入研究。在这里，我们通过实验研究了在周期性波纹表面上滑动的扩展胶体簇的运动。我们观察到，它们的定向运动和质心运动都被锁定在与基体对称性不重合但由几何波纹确定的方向上。由团簇和基底晶格形成的上部结构。通常，这种云纹＆＃233;上层建筑不是严格周期性的，这取决于簇的大小导致相互竞争的锁定方向。值得注意的是，我们发现了方向锁定对表面波纹轮廓的较高傅立叶分量的依赖性，可以通过外部载荷在原子表面上对其进行调整。这样可以前所未有地控制与表面纳米操作相关的簇转向。

title: Topological transition in stratified fluids
title_cn: 分层流体的拓扑转变
abstract: Lamb waves are trapped acoustic-gravity waves that propagate energy over great distances along a solid boundary in density-stratified, compressible fluids. They constitute useful indicators of explosions in planetary atmospheres. When the density stratification exceeds a threshold, or when the impermeability condition at the boundary is relaxed, atmospheric Lamb waves suddenly disappear. Here, we use topological arguments to predict the possible existence of new trapped Lamb-like waves in the absence of a solid boundary, depending on the stratification profile. The topological origin of the Lamb-like waves is emphasized by relating their existence to two-band crossing points carrying opposite Chern numbers. The existence of these band crossings coincides with a restoration of the vertical mirror symmetry that is in general broken by gravity. From this perspective, Lamb-like waves also bear strong similarities with boundary modes encountered in the quantum valley Hall effect and its classical analogues. Our study shows that the presence of Lamb-like waves encodes essential information on the underlying stratification profile in astrophysical and geophysical flows, which is often poorly constrained by observations.
abstract_cn: 兰姆波是被捕获的声重力波，它们在密度分层的可压缩流体中沿着固体边界沿远距离传播能量。它们是行星大气爆炸的有用指示。当密度分层超过阈值时，或当边界处的不渗透条件放松时，大气中的兰姆波突然消失。在这里，我们使用拓扑学论据来预测在没有实心边界的情况下新捕获的羔羊状波的可能存在，具体取决于分层分布。通过将它们的存在与携带相反Chern数的两个频带交叉点相关联，来强调类Lamb波的拓扑起源。这些带交叉的存在与通常被重力破坏的垂直镜对称性的恢复一致。从这个角度来看，类似兰姆波的波与量子谷霍尔效应及其经典类似物所遇到的边界模态也具有很强的相似性。我们的研究表明，类似Lamb的波浪的存在编码了有关天体物理和地球物理流中潜在分层特征的基本信息，而这些信息通常很难受到观测的约束。</ p>

title: Quantum simulation of Unruh radiation
title_cn: Unruh辐射的量子模拟
abstract: The exploration of quantum phenomena in a curved spacetime is an emerging interdisciplinary area at the interface between general relativity, thermodynamics and quantum information. One famous prediction in this field is Unruh thermal radiation—the manifestation of thermal radiation from a Minkowski vacuum when viewed in an accelerating reference frame. Here, we report the experimental observation of a matter field with thermal fluctuations that agree with Unruh’s predictions. The matter field is generated within a framework for the simulation of quantum physics in a non-inertial frame, based on Bose–Einstein condensates that are parametrically modulated to make their evolution replicate the frame transformation. We further observe long-range phase coherence and temporal reversal of the matter-wave radiation, hallmarks that distinguish Unruh radiation from its classical counterpart. Our demonstration offers a new avenue for the investigation of the dynamics of quantum many-body systems in a curved spacetime.
abstract_cn: 在弯曲时空中探索量子现象是广义相对论，热力学和量子信息之间的界面上一个新兴的跨学科领域。该领域的一个著名预测是Unruh热辐射，在加速参考系中观察时，是Minkowski真空产生的热辐射。在这里，我们报告了一个具有热波动的物质场的实验观察结果，该波动与Unruh的预测一致。物质场是在用于模拟非惯性框架的量子物理学的框架内生成的，该框架基于参数化调制的Bose-Einstein凝聚物，以使其演化复制框架变换。我们进一步观察到物质波辐射的远程相位相干性和时间反转，这标志着Unruh辐射与经典辐射的区别。我们的演示为研究弯曲时空中的量子多体系统动力学提供了新途径。

title: Identifying topological order through unsupervised machine learning
title_cn: 通过无监督机器学习识别拓扑顺序
abstract: The Landau description of phase transitions relies on the identification of a local order parameter that indicates the onset of a symmetry-breaking phase. In contrast, topological phase transitions evade this paradigm and, as a result, are harder to identify. Recently, machine learning techniques have been shown to be capable of characterizing topological order in the presence of human supervision. Here, we propose an unsupervised approach based on diffusion maps that learns topological phase transitions from raw data without the need for manual feature engineering. Using bare spin configurations as input, the approach is shown to be capable of classifying samples of the two-dimensional XY model by winding number and capture the Berezinskii–Kosterlitz–Thouless transition. We also demonstrate the success of the approach on the Ising gauge theory, another paradigmatic model with topological order. In addition, a connection between the output of diffusion maps and the eigenstates of a quantum-well Hamiltonian is derived. Topological classification via diffusion maps can therefore enable fully unsupervised studies of exotic phases of matter.
abstract_cn: Landau对相变的描述依赖于对局部对称参数的标识，该参数指示对称破坏相的开始。相反，拓扑相变规避了这种范式，因此更难以识别。近来，机器学习技术已被证明能够在人类监督下表征拓扑顺序。在这里，我们提出了一种基于扩散图的无监督方法，该方法可从原始数据中学习拓扑相变，而无需进行人工特征工程。使用裸旋转配置作为输入，该方法显示出能够通过缠绕数对二维XY模型的样本进行分类，并捕获Berezinskii＆＃8211; Kosterlitz＆＃8211的无意过渡。我们还论证了基于Ising规范理论的方法的成功，该理论是另一种具有拓扑顺序的范式模型。另外，导出了扩散图的输出与量子阱哈密顿量的本征态之间的联系。因此，通过扩散图进行拓扑分类可以完全无监督地研究外来物质阶段。

title: Chiral topological superconductivity arising from the interplay of geometric phase and electron correlation
title_cn: 几何相和电子相关性相互作用引起的手性拓扑超导
abstract: In modern theory of solids, many-electron correlations can give rise to superconductivity, while the Berry or geometric phase is responsible for non-trivial topology. So far, these two physical ingredients have been taken into account only in a simple additive manner. Here, we carry out a systematic study of the interplay between geometric phase and electron correlation as well as their combined effects on topological and superconducting properties. Based on first-principles studies of Pb3Bi/Ge(111) as a prototypical system, we develop a generic two-dimensional effective formalism that respects hexagonal symmetry with Rashba spin–orbit coupling, displays a van Hove singularity and includes geometric phase-decorated electron correlations. Our functional renormalization group analysis shows that superconductivity dominates the competing orders in the weak interaction regime, with two consequences. First, the renormalized geometric phase flows to three stable fixed points, favouring chiral (px ± ipy)-wave and f-wave superconducting states. Second, the corresponding superconductivity can be substantially enhanced. We construct the phase diagram of the topological quantum states, and identify hole-doped Pb3Bi/Ge(111) as an appealing platform for realizing chiral topological superconductivity in two-dimensional systems that are highly desirable for detecting and braiding Majorana fermions.
abstract_cn: 在现代固体理论中，多电子相关性可产生超导性，而贝里或几何相则构成非平凡的拓扑。到目前为止，仅以简单的加法方式考虑了这两种物理成分。在这里，我们对几何相位和电子相关性之间的相互作用以及它们对拓扑和超导性质的综合影响进行了系统的研究。基于Pb 3 Bi / Ge（111）作为原型系统的第一性原理研究，我们开发了一种通用的二维有效形式，该形式遵循Rashba自旋和/或轨道耦合显示的六边形对称性。 van Hove奇异性，包括几何相位装饰的电子相关性。我们的功能重整化组分析表明，在弱相互作用机制中，超导控制了竞争顺序，产生了两个结果。首先，重新规范化的几何相位流向三个稳定的固定点，有利于手性（p x ＆＃8201;＆＃177;＆＃8201; ip y ）波和f波超导状态。其次，可以大大提高相应的超导性。我们构建了拓扑量子态的相图，并确定了掺杂空穴的Pb 3 Bi / Ge（111）作为实现二维系统中手性拓扑超导性的理想平台检测和编织马里亚纳邦的费米子。

title: Resolution of gauge ambiguities in ultrastrong-coupling cavity quantum electrodynamics
title_cn: 超强耦合腔量子电动力学中规范歧义的解决
abstract: In quantum electrodynamics, the choice of gauge influences the form of light–matter interactions. However, gauge invariance implies that all physical results should be independent of this formal choice. The Rabi model, a widespread description for the dipolar coupling between a two-level atom and a quantized electromagnetic field, seemingly violates this principle in the presence of ultrastrong light–matter coupling, a regime that is now experimentally accessible in many physical systems. This failure is attributed to the finite-level truncation of the matter system, an approximation that enters the derivation of the Rabi model. Here, we identify the source of gauge violation and provide a general method for the derivation of light–matter Hamiltonians in truncated Hilbert spaces that produces gauge-invariant physical results, even for extreme light–matter interaction regimes. This is achieved by compensating the non-localities introduced in the construction of the effective Hamiltonians. The resulting quantum Rabi Hamiltonian in the Coulomb gauge differs significantly in form from the standard one, but provides the same physical results obtained by using the dipole gauge. These results shed light on gauge invariance in the non-perturbative and extreme-interaction regimes, and solve long-lasting controversies arising from gauge ambiguities in the quantum Rabi and Dicke models.
abstract_cn: 在量子电动力学中，规范的选择会影响光与物质相互作用的形式。但是，规格不变性意味着所有物理结果均应独立于此正式选择。 Rabi模型是对两能级原子与量化电磁场之间的偶极耦合的广泛描述，在存在超强光和物质耦合的情况下，拉比模型似乎违反了这一原理，该现象现已在许多物理系统中通过实验获得。该失败归因于物质系统的有限级截断，这是进入Rabi模型推导的近似值。在这里，我们确定了违反规范的根源，并提供了一种一般的方法来推导截断的希尔伯特空间中的光质哈密顿量，即使对于极端的光质相互作用机制，它也会产生量规不变的物理结果。这是通过补偿有效哈密顿量的构造中引入的非局部性来实现的。库仑计中所得的量子拉比哈密顿量与标准形式的量子拉比哈密顿量存在显着差异，但提供了使用偶极计获得的相同物理结果。这些结果揭示了非扰动和极端相互作用状态下的规范不变性，并解决了由量子Rabi和Dicke模型中的规范歧义引起的长期争议。

title: Unified theory of thermal transport in crystals and glasses
title_cn: 晶体和玻璃中热传递的统一理论
abstract: Crystals and glasses exhibit fundamentally different heat conduction mechanisms: the periodicity of crystals allows for the excitation of propagating vibrational waves that carry heat, as first discussed by Peierls, while in glasses the lack of periodicity breaks Peierls’s picture and heat is mainly carried by the coupling of vibrational modes, often described by a harmonic theory introduced by Allen and Feldman. Anharmonicity or disorder are thus the limiting factors for thermal conductivity in crystals or glasses. Hitherto, no transport equation has been able to account for both. Here, we derive such an equation, resulting in a thermal conductivity that reduces to the Peierls and Allen–Feldman limits, respectively, in anharmonic crystals or harmonic glasses, while also covering the intermediate regimes where both effects are relevant. This approach also solves the long-standing problem of accurately predicting the thermal properties of crystals with ultralow or glass-like thermal conductivity, as we show with an application to a thermoelectric material representative of this class.
abstract_cn: 水晶和玻璃表现出根本不同的热传导机制：如Peierls首先讨论的那样，晶体的周期性允许激发传播热量的振动波，而在玻璃中，缺乏周期性会破坏Peierls的图像和热量主要通过振动模式的耦合来承载，通常由Allen和Feldman引入的谐波理论来描述。因此，非谐性或无序性是晶体或玻璃中热导率的限制因素。迄今为止，还没有运输方程能够解决这两个问题。在这里，我们推导了这样一个方程式，从而导致热导率分别降低到非谐晶体或谐波玻璃中的Peierls和Allen Feldman极限，同时还涵盖了两种作用都相关的中间状态。这种方法还解决了长期存在的问题，即准确预测具有超低或类似玻璃的热导率的晶体的热性能，正如我们在代表此类的热电材料中的应用所示。

title: Polaron spin dynamics in high-mobility polymeric semiconductors
title_cn: 高迁移率聚合物半导体中的极化子自旋动力学
abstract: Polymeric semiconductors exhibit exceptionally long spin lifetimes, and recently observed micrometre spin diffusion lengths in conjugated polymers demonstrate the potential for organic spintronics devices. Weak spin–orbit and hyperfine interactions lie at the origin of their long spin lifetimes, but the coupling mechanism of a spin to its environment remains elusive. Here, we present a systematic study of polaron spin lifetimes in field-effect transistors with high-mobility conjugated polymers as an active layer. We demonstrate how spin relaxation is governed by the charges’ hopping motion at low temperatures, whereas an Elliott–Yafet-like relaxation due to a transient localization of the carrier wavefunctions is responsible for spin relaxation at high temperatures. In this regime, charge, spin and structural dynamics are intimately related and depend sensitively on the local conformation of polymer backbones and the crystalline packing of the polymer chains.
abstract_cn: 聚合物半导体具有异常长的自旋寿命，最近观察到的共轭聚合物中的微米自旋扩散长度证明了有机自旋电子器件的潜力。 弱的自旋轨道和超精细相互作用是其长自旋寿命的起源，但自旋与其环境的耦合机制仍然难以捉摸。 在这里，我们提出了以高迁移率共轭聚合物为有源层的场效应晶体管中极化子自旋寿命的系统研究。 我们演示了电荷如何控制自旋弛豫。 低温下的跳跃运动，而由于载流子波函数的瞬时定位而引起的类似Elliott的Yafet弛豫是高温下自旋弛豫的原因。 在这种状态下，电荷，自旋和结构动力学密切相关，并敏感地取决于聚合物主链的局部构象和聚合物链的晶体堆积。</ p>

title: Scaling laws indicate distinct nucleation mechanisms of holes in the nuclear lamina
title_cn: 比例定律表明核层中孔的独特成核机制
abstract: During a first-order phase transition, an interfacial layer is formed between the coexisting phases and kinetically limits homogeneous nucleation of the new phase in the original phase. This inhibition is commonly alleviated by the presence of impurities, often of unknown origin, that serve as heterogeneous nucleation sites for the transition. Living systems present a theoretical opportunity: the regulated structure of living systems allows modelling of the impurities, enabling quantitative analysis and comparison between homogeneous and heterogeneous nucleation mechanisms, usually a difficult task. Here, we formulate an analytical model of heterogeneous nucleation of holes in the nuclear lamina, a phenomenon with implications in cancer metastasis, ageing and other diseases. We then present measurements of hole nucleation in the lamina of nuclei migrating through controlled constrictions and fit the experimental data to our heterogeneous nucleation model as well as a homogeneous model. Surprisingly, we find that different mechanisms dominate depending on the density of filaments that comprise the nuclear lamina.
abstract_cn: 在一次相变期间，在共存相之间形成界面层，并在动力学上限制了原始相中新相的均匀成核。通常通过存在杂质（通常来源不明）来减轻这种抑制作用，这些杂质充当过渡的异质形核位点。生命系统提供了理论上的机会：生命系统的受规制结构允许对杂质进行建模，从而可以对均相和异相成核机制进行定量分析和比较，这通常是一项艰巨的任务。在这里，我们建立了一个核层板中孔异质成核的分析模型，这种现象与癌症转移，衰老和其他疾病有关。然后，我们介绍通过可控收缩区域迁移的核层中孔成核的测量结果，并将实验数据拟合到我们的异质成核模型和均质模型中。令人惊讶的是，我们发现不同的机制取决于构成核层的细丝的密度。</ p>

title: Lattice defects induce microtubule self-renewal
title_cn: 晶格缺陷诱导微管自我更新
abstract: Microtubules are dynamic polymers, which grow and shrink by addition and removal of tubulin dimers at their extremities. Within the microtubule shaft, dimers adopt a densely packed and highly ordered crystal-like lattice structure, which is generally not considered to be dynamic. Here, we report that thermal forces are sufficient to remodel the microtubule shaft, despite its apparent stability. Our combined experimental data and numerical simulations on lattice dynamics and structure suggest that dimers can spontaneously leave and be incorporated into the lattice at structural defects. We propose a model mechanism, where the lattice dynamics is initiated via a passive breathing mechanism at dislocations, which are frequent in rapidly growing microtubules. These results show that we may need to extend the concept of dissipative dynamics, previously established for microtubule extremities, to the entire shaft, instead of considering it as a passive material.
abstract_cn: 微管是动态聚合物，其通过在末端添加和去除微管蛋白二聚体而生长和收缩。 在微管轴内，二聚体采用密集堆积且高度有序的类晶体晶格结构，通常认为它不是动态的。 在这里，我们报道了热力足以重塑微管轴，尽管它具有明显的稳定性。 我们结合晶格动力学和结构的实验数据和数值模拟表明，二聚体可以自发离开并在结构缺陷处掺入晶格中。 我们提出了一种模型机制，其中晶格动力学通过位错处的被动呼吸机制启动，这在快速生长的微管中很常见。 这些结果表明，我们可能需要将先前为微管末端建立的耗散动力学概念扩展到整个轴，而不是将其视为被动材料。

title: Stress relaxation in epithelial monolayers is controlled by the actomyosin cortex
title_cn: 上皮单层的应力松弛由放线菌素皮层控制
abstract: Epithelial monolayers are one-cell-thick tissue sheets that line most of the body surfaces, separating internal and external environments. As part of their function, they must withstand extrinsic mechanical stresses applied at high strain rates. However, little is known about how monolayers respond to mechanical deformations. Here, by subjecting suspended epithelial monolayers to stretch, we find that they dissipate stresses on a minute timescale and that relaxation can be described by a power law with an exponential cut-off at timescales larger than about 10 s. This process involves an increase in monolayer length, pointing to active remodelling of cellular biopolymers at the molecular scale during relaxation. Strikingly, monolayers consisting of tens of thousands of cells relax stress with similar dynamics to single rounded cells, and both respond similarly to perturbations of the actomyosin cytoskeleton. By contrast, cell–cell junctional complexes and intermediate filaments do not relax tissue stress, but form stable connections between cells, allowing monolayers to behave rheologically as single cells. Taken together, our data show that actomyosin dynamics governs the rheological properties of epithelial monolayers, dissipating applied stresses and enabling changes in monolayer length.
abstract_cn: 上皮单层是单细胞厚的组织片，覆盖着大多数身体表面，将内部和外部环境分隔开来。作为其功能的一部分，它们必须承受以高应变速率施加的外部机械应力。然而，关于单层如何响应机械变形的知之甚少。在这里，通过使悬浮的上皮单层受到拉伸，我们发现它们在微小的时间尺度上消除了应力，并且松弛可以由幂律描述，并且在大于约10 s的时间尺度上具有指数截止值。该过程涉及单层长度的增加，表明细胞生物聚合物在松弛过程中在分子尺度上发生主动重塑。令人惊讶的是，由成千上万个细胞组成的单分子层以与单个圆形细胞相似的动力学来释放压力，并且两者都对放线菌素细胞骨架的扰动具有相似的响应。相比之下，细胞的细胞结合复合物和中间丝不会缓解组织压力，而是在细胞之间形成稳定的连接，从而使单分子层的流变行为像单个细胞一样。综上所述，我们的数据表明，肌动球蛋白的动力学决定着上皮单层的流变特性，消除了施加的应力，并使单层长度发生变化。

title: Mechanochemical self-organization determines search pattern in migratory cells
title_cn: 机械化学自组织决定了迁移细胞的搜索方式
abstract: To reach their destination, migrating cells rely on polarized signal inputs to align the direction of their motion. However, navigational guidance cues are not always present, which establishes the need for exploratory search mechanisms in cells seeking signal inputs. Here, we investigate how non-Brownian search patterns emerge in adherent vertebrate cells. Combining experimental and theoretical analysis, we demonstrate that nanoscale plasma membrane deformations nucleate a mechanochemical feedback loop that mediates longevity of the cell’s leading edge, a necessary requirement for directed cell migration. We further observe stochastic transitions between phases of random and persistent cell motion, whereby the mechanochemical circuit augments cell persistence and search area. Collectively, these findings are consistent with a self-organizing system for a superdiffusive pattern of motion that is spontaneously employed by migratory cells in the absence of external signal inputs.
abstract_cn: 要到达目的地，迁移的单元格依靠极化信号输入来对齐其运动方向。然而，导航指导线索并不总是存在，这建立了在寻找信号输入的小区中对探索性搜索机制的需求。在这里，我们研究了如何在附着的脊椎动物细胞中出现非布朗搜索模式。结合实验和理论分析，我们证明纳米级质膜变形使机械化学反馈环成核，该反馈环介导了细胞前沿的寿命，这是定向细胞迁移的必要条件。我们进一步观察到随机和持续细胞运动阶段之间的随机过渡，从而机械化学电路增加了细胞的持久性和搜索面积。总的来说，这些发现与超扩散运动的自组织系统是一致的，该运动系统在没有外部信号输入的情况下由迁移细胞自发地采用。

title: Substrate area confinement is a key determinant of cell velocity in collective migration
title_cn: 底物区域限制是集体迁移中细胞速度的关键决定因素
abstract: Collective cell migration is fundamental throughout development, during wound healing and in many diseases. Although much effort has focused on cell–cell junctions, a role for physical confinement in collective cell migration remains unclear. Here, we used adhesive microstripes of varying widths to mimic the spatial confinement experienced by follower cells within epithelial tissues. Our results reveal that the substrate area confinement is sufficient to modulate the three-dimensional cellular morphology without the need for intercellular adhesive cues. Our findings show a direct correlation between the migration velocity of confined cells and their cell–substrate adhesive area. Closer examination revealed that adhesive area confinement reduces lamellipodial protrusive forces, decreases the number of focal complexes at the leading edge and prevents the maturation of focal adhesions at the trailing edge, together leading to less effective forward propelling forces. The release of follower confinement required for the emergence of leader cells is associated with a threefold increase in contractile stress and a tenfold increase in protrusive forces, together providing a sufficient stress to generate highly motile mesenchymal cells. These findings demonstrate that epithelial confinement alone can induce follower-like behaviours and identify substrate adhesive area confinement as a key determinant of cell velocity in collective migration.
abstract_cn: 集体细胞迁移是整个过程，伤口愈合以及许多疾病的基础。尽管已将大量精力集中在细胞连接上，但尚不清楚物理限制在集体细胞迁移中的作用。在这里，我们使用了不同宽度的粘合微带，以模仿上皮组织内跟随细胞所经历的空间限制。我们的结果表明，基板面积的限制足以调节三维细胞形态，而无需细胞间粘附提示。我们的发现表明，密闭细胞的迁移速度与其细胞与基底的粘附面积之间存在直接的相关性。仔细检查发现，粘着剂区域的限制减小了层状脂质体的突出力，减少了前缘处的局灶性复合物的数量，并防止了后缘处的局灶性粘膜的成熟，共同导致了较低的前向推进力。前导细胞的出现所需的跟随者释放的释放与收缩应力的三倍增加和突出力的十倍增加相关，一起提供了足够的应力以产生高度活动的间充质细胞。这些发现表明，单独的上皮封闭可以诱导追随者样行为，并确定底物粘着区域的封闭是集体迁移中细胞速度的关键决定因素。
